titles.title: Preservation of the Second Amendment in National Parks and National Wildlife Refuges Act
A bill to preserve the rights granted under second amendment to the Constitution in national parks and national wildlife refuge areas.
Preservation of the Second Amendment in National Parks and National Wildlife Refuges Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

term.name: Wilderness and natural areas, wildlife refuges, wild rivers, habitats

bill.summary: Preservation of the Second Amendment in National Parks and National Wildlife Refuges Act - Allows, except as provided under federal criminal law relating to the possession of firearms and other dangerous weapons in federal facilities, a person to possess, carry, and transport concealed, loaded, and operable firearms within a national park area or national wildlife refuge area in accordance with the laws of the state in which such area, or that portion thereof, is located.
